snippet: In the first trial stemming from a corruption scandal that shook Albany in April, Eric A. Stevenson is charged with taking over $20,000 to help build an adult day care center in the Bronx.
abstract: Trial of New York Assemblyman Eric A Stevenson is first one to grow out of corruption scandal that rocked Albany in April 2013; he is charged with taking over $20,000 to help build adult day care center in Bronx.
lead_paragraph: In the first trial stemming from a corruption scandal that shook Albany in April, Eric A. Stevenson is charged with taking over $20,000 to help build an adult day care center in the Bronx.

headline.main: Corruption Trial Begins for a Bronx Assemblyman
headline.print_headline: Corruption Trial Begins For a Bronx Assemblyman
